alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:51AM AKST until December 26 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW AND FREEZING RAIN CONTINUE ACROSS THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... Snowfall will continue through the morning hours across Skagway and Haines, with periods of freezing rain. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain and some snow is still occurring. Additional snowfall accumulations of up to 2 inches, and ice accumulations of around a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Haines Borough, and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light Freezing rain is still being observed near Haines this morning. Periods of light freezing rain is still likely through the rest of the day.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
